resourcepack.open_book: &bClick here &7or type &b/resourcepack &7to open the resource pack book.
resourcepack.sent:  &7The resource pack was sent to you! Make sure you allowed it to install.
resourcepack.book.enabled: &aThe resource pack will not be downloaded automatically.
resourcepack.book.disabled: &cThe resource pack will now download automatically.
rpbook.title: Resource pack
rpbook.description: This server depends on a resource pack for cool textures and models. Please, make sure to accept it. It can take some time to load it.
rpbook.enable.hover:
Open this book before
loading the resource pack
rpbook.disable.hover:
Load the resource pack
without opening this book
